pk.contender.earmouse

Class ModuleStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • pk.contender.earmouse.ModuleStats

  • public class ModuleStats
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of all the answers a user has given to exercises of a specific Module.

    Provides methods for entering answers and obtaining useful information about this data and for reading and writing recorded statistical data to local storage.

    Author:
    Paul Klinkenberg

      • saveModuleStats

        public void saveModuleStats()
        Save this instance to local storage, if the file doesn't exist, creates it, otherwise overwrites existing data.

      • addAnswer

        public void addAnswer(int exerciseIndex,
             boolean result)
        Add an answer to moduleAnswerList
        Parameters:
        exerciseIndex - The index of the exercise the answer refers to
        result - The correctness of the answer

      • calculateSuccessRate

        public int calculateSuccessRate()
        Calculates the success rate of the registered answers.
        Returns:
        The percentage of registered answers that is correct or -1 if there is no available data.

      • exercisesCompleted

        public int exercisesCompleted()
        Returns the total amount of exercises completed

        An exercise is completed when the user gave the correct answer, even if there were wrong answers before that. Since one moves on to the next exercise after giving a correct answer, the number of exercises completed is the same as the number of correct answers given.

        Returns:
        the number of exercises in this module that were answered correctly.

      • exerciseSuccessRate

        public int exerciseSuccessRate(int exerciseIndex)
        Returns the success rate in % of a particular exerciseIndex, returns 0 if no exercises were found
        Parameters:
        exerciseIndex - the individual exercise whose success rate to return
        Returns:
        the success rate in % of the exercise with index exerciseIndex, or 0 if no records were found.

      • exerciseCount

        public int exerciseCount(int exerciseIndex)
        Returns the number of times exerciseIndex is registered.
        Parameters:
        exerciseIndex -
        Returns:
        the number of times exerciseIndex is registered in moduleAnswerList

      • purgeStats

        public boolean purgeStats()
        Delete all statistical data for this instance.
        Returns:
        True on success, false otherwise.
